property.name: linkExpression
property.description: Type "C". Expression for link to report table cache

methodref.name: Close
methodref.description: Force the memory table to close (dispose).

methodref.name: DetachHandle
methodref.description: Detach the memory table handle to direct access.

methodref.name: LookupReport
methodref.description: Return report that matches a key.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.

page.original:
Reporting::ReportGeneratorMemTable Class Properties Property Type Description linkExpression C Expression for link to report table cache
Methods Method Description PUBLIC Close AS v ()Force the memory table to close (dispose). PUBLIC DetachHandle AS n ()Detach the memory table handle to direct access. PUBLIC GetHandle AS n ()Get handle (but do not detatch). PUBLIC LookupReport AS c (key AS A)Return report that matches a key. PUBLIC NewInstance AS P ()Create a new object instance of the same type.
See Also Reporting Namespace
